term_trace.Requirement: The "AUV_Module" shall define a Function named "odist", which takes an "Obstacle" as input, that returns the distance from the AUV to the Obstacle (as "real").

term_trace.Instance_description: A function that calculates the distance from the AUV to an obstacle, returning a real number.
